sentences.sContent: The edge of this axe has turned.
sentences.sContent_eng: The edge of this axe has turned.

sentences.sContent: He had just hit her over the head with the blunt end of an axe, fracturing her skull in three places.
sentences.sContent_eng: He had just hit her over the head with the blunt end of an axe, fracturing her skull in three places.
sentences.sCn: 就在刚刚，他用斧子另一端猛敲了妮基的头一下，将她的颅骨敲断裂成了三块。

sentences.sContent: If all else fails, take all the unused hardware out to the back yard and go to town with a handy bat, golf club, machete, or axe.
sentences.sContent_eng: If all else fails, take all the unused hardware out to the back yard and go to town with a handy bat, golf club, machete, or axe.
sentences.sCn: 如果一切都失败了，采取一切无用的硬件出到后院，去同一个方便的球棒，高尔夫球俱乐部，砍刀，斧头或到城里。

phrases.pCn: 另有所图；有不同意见；别有用心

trans.tranOther: a tool with a heavy metal blade on the end of a long handle, used to cut down trees or split pieces of wood
